name: Snakris
description:
Snakris is a hybrid abstract puzzle game, when Snake meets Tetris.

In the upper red area you play Snake and use it to build pieces to the lower blue area, where you need to clear the lines, just like Tetris.

Once the piece you built in the Upper area, be it by your choice or by mistake, it will fall straight down.

In the UI there is a indicator for the size of the Snake, it is a handy information.

The controls are simple, Arrow Keys or WASD to direct the Snake, and Space to drop it down.

Donations are much appreciated, to keep the server used in the scores running.
